homepage.hero.title.description: The hero title on the homepage

homepage.hero.subtitle.message: Curvine is a high-performance distributed caching system implemented in Rust, designed for low-latency and high-throughput workloads with powerful data governance capabilities.
homepage.hero.subtitle.description: The hero subtitle on the homepage

homepage.features.subtitle.message: Curvine delivers exceptional performance through innovative architecture and cutting-edge technology.

homepage.features.performance.descriptio.message: Built with Rust for maximum performance, delivering microsecond-level latency and millions of operations per second.

homepage.features.distributed.descriptio.message: Horizontally scalable architecture with automatic sharding and replication for high availability.

homepage.features.memory.description.message: Advanced memory management with intelligent caching strategies and automatic garbage collection.

homepage.usecases.subtitle.message: With the development of big data and AI, the performance requirements for large-scale data processing are increasing. Curvine is designed to solve large-scale IO acceleration and break through single-machine memory cache capacity bottlenecks.

homepage.usecases.ai.title.description: AI training acceleration use case title

homepage.usecases.ai.description.message: Provides high-speed data access for deep learning training, significantly reducing data loading time, improving GPU utilization, and accelerating model training processes.
homepage.usecases.ai.description.description: AI training acceleration use case description

homepage.usecases.inference.title.description: Large model inference use case title

homepage.usecases.inference.description.message: Optimizes data access for large language model inference scenarios, reducing inference latency and improving model service response speed and throughput.
homepage.usecases.inference.description.description: Large model inference use case description

homepage.usecases.olap.description.message: Provides high-speed caching for analytical databases and OLAP engines, significantly improving complex query performance and reducing data analysis time.

homepage.usecases.bigdata.title.description: Big data computing use case title

homepage.usecases.bigdata.description.message: Provides hot data caching and shuffle acceleration for big data offline computing, significantly improving data processing efficiency.
homepage.usecases.bigdata.description.description: Big data computing use case description

homepage.performance.subtitle.message: Curvine delivers industry-leading performance metrics that set new standards for distributed caching systems.

homepage.gettingstarted.subtitle.message: Deploy Curvine quickly with our comprehensive documentation and tools.

homepage.gettingstarted.step1.descriptio.message: Download and install Curvine using our simple installation script.

homepage.gettingstarted.step2.descriptio.message: Set up your cluster configuration with our intuitive configuration files.

homepage.gettingstarted.step3.descriptio.message: Launch your high-performance caching cluster and start serving requests.

homepage.cta.title.message: Ready to Get Started with Curvine?

homepage.cta.subtitle.message: Download now and experience the high-performance distributed caching system that Curvine brings.
